ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | spcimdv.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. B ) |
| 2 |  | spcimedv.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ch -> ps ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_con3d | |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( -. ps -> -. ch ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_spcimdv | |- ( ph -> ( A. x -. ps -> -. ch ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_con2d | |- ( ph -> ( ch -> -. A. x -. ps ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_df-ex | |- ( E. x ps <-> -. A. x -. ps ) |
